content.raw:
You are right. And because <g> elements can also contain other <g> elements, the XML parsing needs to be enhanced (and that can be part of porting to libtinyxml2).
What adds to the confusion is that in transform3.svg, the transform was specified after the coordinates, and so the transformation was not even applied. Transform3 is also uncovering a problem with matrix transformation.
